txt.en: It seems that the Angmarim may at best be searching for something, or perhaps simply meddling in the conflicts between the Lossoth and the Gauredain. A full-strength invasion does not seem to be their purpose in Forochel -- at least, not yet.

Your constant attacks against the Angmarim in Forochel have doubtlessly drawn the ire of their commanders, for the line of supply with Angmar lies though difficult and harsh mountain passes. You have made their minor expedition into Forochel a far more costly affair than they had certainly bargained for.
